title: Study for the Ceiling of the Old Hôtel de Ville, Paris
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Karl-Ernest-Rodolphe-Heinrich-Salem Lehmann [1814-1882], Paris, France. Maurice Delacre [1862-1938], Ghent, Belgium [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. L. 747a. The collector's mark appears on the lower right of the drawing. 
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
